version_description:
• Check out our new Apple Watch app! It has been rebuilt from ground up to support new Watch OS versions.
• Missing and injured players are now available below the lineups (for selected matches)
• If you follow a tennis player, his/her doubles match

• At the bottom of match details in football, attribute comparison of 2 best players from each team, based on the rating in last match. In basketball matches, "shoot map" of player who scored most points (from any team).
• When the TV broadcast is avai
• Fix for a bug with animations that occurs in some cases
• Need to remember something related to a match? You can now use our simple, but powerful notes (open match details > tap on "Notes" icon placed in top right corner)

• In player statistics from previous seasons, team name has been added
• New design of "remove ads" screen
• Small bug fixes and performance improvements
• Small bug fixes and performance improvements

• Join the discussion with other sports enthusiasts on SofaScore Forum (News replaced by Forum in the navigation drawer).
• New design of “Top predictors” table with ROI (return-on-investment) information
• Additional information in tournament det

• Season heatmap for players
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Optimizations and improvements for iOS 11
• Minor bugs fixed

• ATP series information for tennis tournaments
• Improved looks and animations of match votes (Who will win?)
• Optimizations and improvements for iPhone X

• 3 new sports are now available in SofaScore app - Cycling, Beach volleyball and Table tennis. We got you covered for all events from UCI, FIVB and ITTF World Tours
• "Sign in" is completely rebuilt from ground up and whole experience should be a lot

• Dropdown menu for seasons is now placed below the tournament name
• Other minor bug fixes and improvements
• Bug with player numbers in lineups is now fixed

• App is now translated to 6 new languages: Albanian, Bulgarian, Hindi, Serbian, Thai, Ukranian
• Fixed bug with calendar on iPhone X and Plus
• Other minor bugs fixed
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• History chart for managers with average points and time spent in club/team
• Improved suggestions for venue/stadium changes
• Squads are now available for teams in Handball (ex. national teams in EHF Euro 2018)
• News about SofaScore are repla

• Option to change language in app settings
• Countries where TV broadcast is available, are now visible on the top of the list
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

• App is now translated to 6 new languages: Albanian, Bulgarian, Hindi, Serbian, Thai, Ukranian
• Fixed bug with calendar on iPhone X and Plus
• Other minor bugs fixed

• We have finally added push notifications for goal scorers. Please go to app “Notifications settings” and activate them manually
• Pre-match standings/form is added to event details – quick overview of team’s form, rank and points before the match

• We have finally added push notifications for goal scorers. Please go to app “Notifications settings” and activate them manually
• Pre-match standings/form is added to event details – quick overview of team’s form, rank and points before the match

• Chat room for NBA playoffs
• Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements

• Option for changing currency in app settings
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

• You can now follow Motorsports and Cycling races, receive notifications and add them to Favorites. Remember that, from now on, Formula 1 is now available under Motorsports category!
• Detailed information for World Cup 2018 stadiums (on World Cup tou

• You can now follow Motorsports and Cycling races, receive notifications and add them to Favorites. Remember that, from now on, Formula 1 is now available under Motorsports category!
• Detailed information for World Cup 2018 stadiums (on World Cup tou

• Find all player transfers in one place - tap on "Leagues" and select "Player transfers". Transfers can be sorted by player value, transfer fee and date. If the list is too long you can additionally filter out nationality, leagues, position and age.

• Goal scorer notifications for ice hockey matches
• New navigation bar in team and player details
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

• Notifications for tennis "break"
• Current minute in basketball quarter
• Lists of "foreign" and "national team" players in team details
• Support for Siri shortcuts
• In case there are no matches on selected date, shortcut to the first next
• More bugs fixed and other performance improvements

• Basketball season shoot maps added in player details
• Minor bugs fixed and performance improvements

• Widget series results and aggregated results
• TV schedule button in event details
• "Matches" tab in manager page
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Design improvements in Formula 1
• Option to follow handball players and receive notifications
• "Media" tab in Motorsports

• You can finally enable dark theme (night mode) inside the app. Go to "More" - "Settings" - "Dark mode" and put the slider to "On" position. All comments and suggestions are more than welcome
• Bug fixes

• TV schedule is now available in More tab. Select all the channels that you have available and make your personalized TV schedule by days
• If you purchased subscription for ads removal, you can now turn off odds in match details

• Test your sports knowledge with SofaScore Quiz. 10 multiple answer questions, 10 seconds to answer each question, 6-10 points for a question depending on the speed. Let us know what you think via in-app feedback dialog or at our email support@sofascore.

• Improvements in SofaScore Quiz: New point-scoring system (explained in "How to play" dialog), daily and overall rankings, points per question stats. Leaderboard now has three different views (daily, yesterday, overall) and you can access your SofaScore

• Private groups in Sofa Quiz. Create, invite and join to groups and play against your friends
• Driver details in Formula 1 - Bio, rankings and race overview with finished positions
• Bug fixes and stability improvements

• New types of questions, results share and other improvements in Sofa Quiz
• Bug fixes and stability improvements

• Battle Draft game - Select 11 best players for given budget, beat the opponent in 3 out of 5 categories of attributes and progress to the next level. Game is currently in Beta phase so feel free to send your suggestions at support@sofascore.com
• Bug

• Improvements in Battle Draft
• Notification for period results in Ice Hockey
• Current set score is now visible in Table Tennis "Matches" tab
• Canceled and Postponed match will no longer be visible when "Live" filter is applied
• Comeback

• Improvements in Battle Draft
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Battle Draft scores will include player chemistry bonus from 01.08.2020. Selecting players from same club or league will get you more points. Don't forget to update the app until then
• "Buzzer" feed is now available from navigation drawer and we ha

• Player chemistry has been added to Battle Draft. Selecting players from same club or league will get you more points
• "Buzzer" feed is now available from navigation drawer and we have finally added option to hide banners from Matches screen
• Opt

• Live action widget/graphics in Media tab
• Invite other player to a friendly "Battle Draft" match
• Personal quiz attribute overview in 5 categories
